content: ðŸ”¹ Etheraid infrastructure has been preparing for this Monday for 2 months.We created 6 Bots and 5 API systems. We created the CC3 Protocol ecosystem, the API endpoint for smart contracts, which will be the first and only for the cryptocurrency world.Our smart contract is 100% Trustworthy and our technology is 100% working and improving itself. We are here to benefit the Ethereum ecosystem and we will achieve great success.Welcome to EtheraidEtheraid is the software layer and module structure created to benefit the Ethereum blockchain.Get StartedYou can browse our products and software documentation to discover the Etheraid ecosystem and its world of benefits. We exist for the development of the community and the preservation of the innovative nature of the Ethereum blockchain.About USEtheraid is a Utility-Development focused organization created by independent Ethereum and EtherJS developers and aims to benefit the Ethereum ecosystem.Contributing to the blockchain, making the Ethereum blockchain better and providing benefits to the Ethereum communities is the basic principle of our developer team. The Etheraid developer team has chosen to remain anonymous, like other community projects. Our developer team has adopted the vision of providing access to a common goal in different countries.Of course, like every project developer, the Etheraid developer team aims to obtain even small amounts of return in return for benefit. It receives a small amount of commission from trading commissions received when trading Etheraid Tokens.Vision MissionEtheraid project, which wants to be the first priority choice for people/companies who want to develop on the Ethereum blockchain, aims to become a technology center where all developers care about and recommend the unique software and API endpoints it offers.Etheraid cares that all technologies developed in line with these goals are reliable, transparent and easily accessible. Its mission is to offer unlimited and fast resource access to developers without any limitations.DexTools Updated.https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x98192989682b806a980d54cce61ad58efa87f258Fair Launch 02-OCT-2023 MONDAY 2:00 PM UTCDEX: UniswapPair: ETRA/ETHðŸ”¹ Contract Address0x5c1d187ac11b9f7f8e974dde7bf5c69d3c6f6075https://etherscan.io/token/0x5c1d187ac11b9f7f8e974dde7bf5c69d3c6f6075https://etheraid.orghttps://docs.etheraid.orghttps://etheraid.org/developer-portalhttps://etheraid.org/investhttps://twitter.com/etheraidorghttps://t.me/etheraid

comments.author: GodGoat
comments.body: ðŸ”¹Weekly Update PlanThis week, English, Arabic, Japanese, Korean and Turkish language support will be added to our Website.5 New API endpoints will be added for developers.- Transaction Hash Details API- ERC20 Token Social Media and More Information API- Recently Liquidity Locked Tokens List API- Recently Created Pair List API- Ownership Bubblemap APIEtheraid Payment Bot will be activated and Button Ads will be activated on all Etheraid Telegram Bots. All Telegram communities using the Etheraid bot will be given 7 days of free Button ads.Our negotiations for Coinmarketcap continue. Stay tuned.API endpoints will be of unique value to developers and will be free to use.Best regards.
